definition: to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: Upon receiving the bid documents, the bid inviter shall sign for and safe-keep them but may not open them.
sentences.chinese: 招标人收到投标文件后，应当签收保存，不得开启。

sentences.english: Province traffic hall began activity of freeway invite public bidding.
sentences.chinese: 省交通厅开始了高速公路招标活动。

sentences.english: Please read attached RFP for more details.
sentences.chinese: 请仔细阅读招标书附详情。

sentences.english: This is a small budget project so no fancy biddings please.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个很小的预算项目，所以没有华丽的招标请。

sentences.english: The bid-tender system in project construction field of China has already been overall carried out.
sentences.chinese: 我国在工程建设领域已全面推行招标投标制度。

sentences.english: If the number of bidders is less than three, the tenderer shall issue the tender anew according to this Law.
sentences.chinese: 投标人少于三个的，招标人应当依照本法重新招标。

sentences.english: If the number of bidders is less than three, the tenderer shall issue the tender anew according to this Law.
sentences.chinese: 投标人少于三个的，招标人应当依照本法重新招标。

sentences.english: Company reserves the right to modify the ITB Documents following issue of the same to the Bidder.
sentences.chinese: 公司有权修改后的招标文件的投标人同样的问题。

sentences.english: The government is going to invite tenders for a new bridge.
sentences.chinese: 政府准备为新桥工程招标。

sentences.english: The bid-invitation of preliminary realty management shall be organized and implemented by the bid inviter.
sentences.chinese: 前期物业管理招标由招标人依法组织实施。

sentences.english: The bid-invitation of preliminary realty management shall be organized and implemented by the bid inviter.
sentences.chinese: 前期物业管理招标由招标人依法组织实施。

sentences.english: It may tender the meat in canned ham and soften the skin of horse bean in canned horse bean.
sentences.chinese: 它可以在招标罐头火腿肉罐头和软化的蚕豆蚕豆皮肤。

sentences.english: The National Development and Reform Commission shall take the lead in carrying out the inter-departmental coordination mechanism for bidding and tendering.
sentences.chinese: 国家发展改革委为招标投标部际协调机制牵头单位。

sentences.english: So comparison sourcing is not possible per legal requirements for procurement.
sentences.chinese: 因此，采购法规要求的比较招标变得不可能。

sentences.english: Need a PHP script to bid on items from a bidding website.
sentences.chinese: 需要一个PHP脚本来从一个投标招标网项目。

sentences.english: C. Submit the bid and allow your brother to negotiate with the contracting office.
sentences.chinese: 发出招标书并让你的兄弟与合同部门谈判。

definition: to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority
bid or tender submission or delivery/bid or tender document
to begin work (of a factory or engineering operation)/to start a construction job
to report for judgment/to submit for approval
